title: I Am Going to Meet My Saviour

author.name: Anonymous
author.bio: This hymn is attributed to an anonymous author and is a traditional hymn often sung at Christian gatherings.

lyrics:
I am going to meet my Saviour
I am going to meet my Lord;
I am going over Jordan
I am going over home.

Chorus
Hallelujah; thank you Jesus;
For the Blood you shed for me.
Thank you Lord; my only Master;
Thank you Lord; for saving me.

2. Though my way seem dark and gloomy
And my pathway so rough and steep
I can hear His sweet voice saying
I am here please call on me.

3. You tell me that trials will come
And temptations are so strong
But I have a hope in glory
And this is my shining crown.
